name: updateOrCreateInvoices
description: Updates or creates one or more sales invoices or purchase bills

summarizeErrors.description: If false return 200 OK and mix of successfully created objects and any with validation errors

unitdp.description: e.g. unitdp=4 – (Unit Decimal Places) You can opt in to use four decimal places for unit amounts

AmountCredited.description: Sum of all credit notes, over-payments and pre-payments applied to invoice

AmountDue.description: Amount remaining to be paid on invoice

AmountPaid.description: Sum of payments received for invoice

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

CISRate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the organisation

CreditNotes.description: Details of credit notes that have been applied to an invoice

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used. (max length = [18].[6])

Date.description: Date invoice was issued – YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

ExpectedPaymentDate.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date the invoice was fully paid. Only returned on fully paid invoices

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has an attachment

HasErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a invoice has an validation errors

InvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for invoice

InvoiceNumber.description: ACCREC – Unique alpha numeric code identifying invoice (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings) (max length = 255)

IsDiscounted.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has a discount

PlannedPaymentDate.description: Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoices

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as “sent”. This can be set only on invoices that have been approved

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax). This will be ignored if it doesn’t equal the sum of the LineAmounts

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the invoice line items

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

IncludeOnline.description: Include the file with the online invoice

Url.description: URL to the file on xero.com

AccountNumber.description: A user defined account number. This can be updated via the API and the Xero UI (max length = 50)

Addresses.description: Store certain address types for a contact – see address types

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

ContactGroups.description: Displays which contact groups a contact is included in

ContactNumber.description: This can be updated via the API only i.e. This field is read only on the Xero contact screen, used to identify contacts in external systems (max length = 50). If the Contact Number is used, this is displayed as Contact Code in the Contacts UI in Xero.

ContactStatus.description: Current status of a contact – see contact status types

Discount.description: The default discount rate for the contact (read only)

EmailAddress.description: Email address of contact person (umlauts not supported) (max length  = 255)

FirstName.description: First name of contact person (max length = 255)

HasAttachments.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an attachment

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

IsCustomer.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact has any AR invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts receivable invoice is generated against this contact.

IsSupplier.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact that has any AP  invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts payable invoice is generated against this contact.

LastName.description: Last name of contact person (max length = 255)

Phones.description: Store certain phone types for a contact – see phone types

PurchasesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default purchases account code for contacts

PurchasesTrackingCategories.description: The default purchases tracking categories for contacts

SalesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default sales account code for contacts

SalesTrackingCategories.description: The default sales tracking categories for contacts

TaxNumber.description: Tax number of contact – this is also known as the ABN (Australia), GST Number (New Zealand), VAT Number (UK) or Tax ID Number (US and global) in the Xero UI depending on which regionalized version of Xero you are using (max length = 50)

TrackingCategoryName.description: The name of the Tracking Category assigned to the contact under SalesTrackingCategories and PurchasesTrackingCategories

TrackingCategoryOption.description: The name of the Tracking Option assigned to the contact under SalesTrackingCategories and PurchasesTrackingCategories

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to contact

ValidationErrors.description: Displays validation errors returned from the API

Balances.description: The raw AccountsReceivable(sales invoices) and AccountsPayable(bills) outstanding and overdue amounts, not converted to base currency (read only)

BatchPaymentDetails.description: Bank details for use on a batch payment stored with each contact

BankAccountName.description: Name of bank for use with Batch Payments

BankAccountNumber.description: Bank account number for use with Batch Payments

Code.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Details.description: (Non-NZ Only) These details are sent to the org’s bank as a reference for the batch payment transaction. They will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement imported into Xero. Maximum field length = 18

Reference.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

CreatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of creation date of branding theme

LogoUrl.description: The location of the image file used as the logo on this branding theme

SortOrder.description: Integer – ranked order of branding theme. The default branding theme has a value of 0

ContactGroupID.description: The Xero identifier for an contact group – specified as a string following the endpoint name. e.g. /297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Contacts.description: The ContactID and Name of Contacts in a contact group. Returned on GETs when the ContactGroupID is supplied in the URL.

Name.description: The Name of the contact group. Required when creating a new contact  group

Status.description: The Status of a contact group. To delete a contact group update the status to DELETED. Only contact groups with a status of ACTIVE are returned on GETs.

IncludeInEmails.description: boolean to indicate whether contact should be included on emails with invoices etc.

CurrencyCode.description: 3 letter alpha code for the currency – see list of currency codes

TrackingCategoryName.description: The default sales tracking category name for contacts

TrackingOptionName.description: The default purchase tracking category name for contacts

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

CISRate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the organisation

CreditNoteNumber.description: ACCRECCREDIT – Unique alpha numeric code identifying credit note (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

Date.description: The date the credit note is issued YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified then it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

FullyPaidOnDate.description: Date when credit note was fully paid(UTC format)

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a credit note has an attachment

HasErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a credit note has an validation errors

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the Credit Note

SentToContact.description: boolean to indicate if a credit note has been sent to a contact via  the Xero app (currently read only)

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the credit note excluding taxes

Total.description: The total of the Credit Note(subtotal + total tax)

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the credit note

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the credit note

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Amount.description: the amount being applied to the invoice

Date.description: the date the allocation is applied YYYY-MM-DD.

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency overpayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

Date.description: The date the overpayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a overpayment has an attachment

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the overpayment

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the overpayment excluding taxes

Total.description: The total of the overpayment (subtotal + total tax)

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the overpayment

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the overpayment

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element. See Line Amount Types

Description.description: Description needs to be at least 1 char long. A line item with just a description (i.e no unit amount or quantity) can be created by specifying just a <Description> element that contains at least 1 character

DiscountAmount.description: Discount amount being applied to a line item. Only supported on ACCREC invoices - ACCPAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts.

DiscountRate.description: Percentage discount being applied to a line item (only supported on  ACCREC invoices – ACC PAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts

LineAmount.description: If you wish to omit either of the <Quantity> or <UnitAmount> you can provide a LineAmount and Xero will calculate the missing amount for you. The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used . i.e LineAmount = Quantity * Unit Amount * ((100 – DiscountRate)/100)

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: The Xero identifier for a Repeating Invoice

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount (see below) based on the tax rate. This value can be overriden if the calculated <TaxAmount> is not correct.

Tracking.description: Optional Tracking Category – see Tracking.  Any LineItem can have a  maximum of 2 <TrackingCategory> elements.

Name.description: The name of the tracking category

TrackingCategoryID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category option

Amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be less than or equal to the outstanding amount owing on the invoice e.g. 200.00

BankAccountNumber.description: The suppliers bank account number the payment is being made to

BatchPaymentID.description: Present if the payment was created as part of a batch.

Code.description: Code of account you are using to make the payment e.g. 001 (note- not all accounts have a code value)

CreditNoteNumber.description: Number of invoice or credit note you are applying payment to e.g. INV-4003

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate when payment is received. Only used for non base currency invoices and credit notes e.g. 0.7500

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD) e.g. 2009-09-06

Details.description: The information to appear on the supplier's bank account

HasAccount.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

InvoiceNumber.description: Number of invoice or credit note you are applying payment to e.g.INV-4003

IsReconciled.description: An optional parameter for the payment. A boolean indicating whether you would like the payment to be created as reconciled when using PUT, or whether a payment has been reconciled when using GET

Particulars.description: The suppliers bank account number the payment is being made to

PaymentID.description: The Xero identifier for an Payment e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Reference.description: An optional description for the payment e.g. Direct Debit

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the payment

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

AccountID.description: The Xero identifier for an account – specified as a string following  the endpoint name   e.g. /297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

AddToWatchlist.description: Boolean – describes whether the account is shown in the watchlist widget on the dashboard

BankAccountNumber.description: For bank accounts only (Account Type BANK)

BankAccountType.description: For bank accounts only. See Bank Account types

Code.description: Customer defined alpha numeric account code e.g 200 or SALES (max length = 10)

Description.description: Description of the Account. Valid for all types of accounts except bank accounts (max length = 4000)

EnablePaymentsToAccount.description: Boolean – describes whether account can have payments applied to it

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an account has an attachment (read only)

ShowInExpenseClaims.description: Boolean – describes whether account code is available for use with expense claims

Status.description: Accounts with a status of ACTIVE can be updated to ARCHIVED. See Account Status Codes

SystemAccount.description: If this is a system account then this element is returned. See System Account types. Note that non-system accounts may have this element set as either “” or null.

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency prepayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

Date.description: The date the prepayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a prepayment has an attachment

Reference.description: Returns Invoice number field. Reference field isn't available.

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the prepayment

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the prepayment excluding taxes

Total.description: The total of the prepayment(subtotal + total tax)

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the prepayment

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the prepayment

$ul: **Elements**: Array of Elements of validation Errors
